sentences.en: Fame and fortune notwithstanding, Donna never forgot her hometown.
sentences.cn: 尽管名利双收，但唐娜从未忘记自己的家乡。

sentences.en: He continued perfectly calm , notwithstanding all my reproaches.
sentences.cn: 尽管我百般埋怨他,他始终是那样的安祥不动.

sentences.en: He despised William Pitt, notwithstanding the similar views they both held.
sentences.cn: 尽管他和威廉·皮特看法相似，却瞧不起他。

sentences.en: He insisted on going to the football match, notwithstanding his doctor's advice to the contrary.
sentences.cn: 他不顾医生的劝阻,坚持要去看足球比赛.

sentences.en: He was misunderstood notwithstanding his good intentions.
sentences.cn: 虽然他的意图是好的,但是仍然被误解了.

sentences.en: His relations with colleagues, differences of opinion notwithstanding, were unfailingly friendly.
sentences.cn: 尽管有意见分歧，他和同事们一直关系融洽。

sentences.en: I don't like movies, but I will go with you notwithstanding.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢看电影, 但我仍会陪你去.

sentences.en: I love the boy notwithstanding this naugtiness.
sentences.cn: 尽管这男孩顽皮,但我仍然喜欢他.

sentences.en: No matter how bad the weather is, the children will play foot - ball on the playground, notwithstanding.
sentences.cn: 不管天气怎么坏, 孩子们还要在运动场踢足球.

sentences.en: Notwithstanding all this furniture, there was still room to turn around in.
sentences.cn: 尽管有这么些家具用品, 倒还有转身余地.

sentences.en: Notwithstanding differences, there are clear similarities in all of the world’s religions.
sentences.cn: 世界上的宗教尽管各不相同，但都有明显的相似之处。

sentences.en: Notwithstanding some major financial problems, the school has had a successful year.
sentences.cn: 虽然有些重大的经费问题，这所学校一年来还是很成功。

sentences.en: Notwithstanding the heat of the sun we must go out.
sentences.cn: 尽管烈日当空、气温炎热,我们还得外出.

sentences.en: She went swimming yesterday notwithstanding ( that ) her mother told her not to.
sentences.cn: 虽然她妈妈告诉不要去游泳,但她昨天还是去了.

sentences.en: They went ahead, public opposition notwithstanding.
sentences.cn: 尽管公众反对,他们仍继续干下去.

sentences.en: Thomas Carlyle , notwithstanding his tedious rhetoric, is a master of the sublime in prose style.
sentences.cn: 尽管 托马斯·卡莱尔 的语言花俏冗长,但是他仍不失为一位令人崇敬的散文文体大师.

sentences.en: Yet notwithstanding all this, the boy grew more and more melancholy and pale and dejected.
sentences.cn: 经过这番“好心”的折腾, 那孩子却更加忧郁、更加苍白、没精打采.
